summary: Bit Buggy. Don't trade stuff with him.
descriptionHtml:
-Location-
Funnily on tope of a table in Jorrvaskr and in Arcadia's Cauldron Chilling out.
-HISTORY-
Hysteric is The Daedric Prince of Hysteria and Lies. He is close Allies with Sheogorath and enemies with Boethiah and Molag Bal. Hysteric is a Khajiit Daedric Prince. He is worshipped by most Khajiit but some outside their race. He may have ties why the Dwemer poisoned the Snow Elves because the Dwemer lied to keep the Snow Elves safe. Hysteric is known to manipulate the species with a certain limit.Â 

-BUGS-
Don't ask to go in his inventory. It will crash your game. I'm warning you. (Soon to be fixed but not now.)

-Help-
Looking for Geniuses who know how the fix the one lousy bug up there.
author: Zabassa Ahrkaron
